body:
Additions:* Add a README document for the code base.
Changes:* Migrate code project hosting to Pagure. Record the change of homepage URL in
  PyPI metadata.
* Raise a warning that the ‘runner’ module is pending deprecation. This has been
  an unofficial example module from the beginning, and it will be removed in a
  future version.
Bug Fixes:* Ensure custom types are part of the Python type hierarchy.
* Avoid a circular dependency for the version string at install time. Thanks to
  Maarten van Gompel for the reproducible test case.
